channel.title: Kind of confused, trying to start server
channel.description:
I know how to program in Java so this step is check I know how to set up the compiler and bla bla bla
BUT THE ONE KEY ELEMENT
Where do you start?
I keep reading
Project Insanity(PI?) and Delta
What are these names? A framework, some kind of base?
These forums aren't really updated to often and the stickies are rotting.
So what I ask from you dear runescape players is where can I start?
I downloaded this https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,469065.0.html
and I've played around but I don't really know any of the methods or really anything? Is there some kind of DOC I can read up on?
I mean I made a script for powerbot and it wasn't to bad because they had some nice organized docs.
Anyways, if someone could just point me in the right direction I would very much appreciate it!
Thanks!

item.title: Kind of confused, trying to start server
item.dc:creator: @hego555 hego555
item.description:
@hego555 wrote:

[quote=“Tom, post:6, topic:535610”]If you’re competent with programming then look at tutorials and the actual code then you’ll understand how things are done and what methods to use. As far as going elsewhere or having stricter submission criteria, this is what the RSPS scene is regardless of where you are. This is what the communities are interested in and are willing to invest time in so this is what the scene produces and submits, it’s not our position to restrain what people can create and post because you don’t find it as playable or take issue with the code they’re writing on top of. The only way this will be solved is if somebody writes a better, clean, and complete server that people of beginner skill level can add onto.

If you want “something good” then go and download a framework and make it. I don’t really understand where the difficulty is, the server setup tutorial works, there is a surplus of tutorials by the community covering about every base imaginable (such as project insanity, and deltascape, or whatever is running rampant now) that you can draw knowledge and insight from. I don’t really know what else to say, can you clarify specifically where your issue is?

https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,51.0.html
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,236.0.html
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,257.0.html[/quote]

Where do I download this framework? Also I have setup a server. I just don’t know how to program It.

Read full topic

item.source: Kind of confused, trying to start server

item.title: Kind of confused, trying to start server
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Well I mean if you want to start a server the simplest way would be too download a framework from the downloads section (see: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,49.0.html). I’ve been away from the private server area a long time, but I can almost guarantee “PI” and “D” are just names of the base the person used when make their server.

Here’s the usual chain of events here.
a terribly programmed framework is released for x revision -> someone downloads said framework, adds more terribly programmed features -> releases their update version of the original framework, and name it something like “(DELTA) 317!!! FULL SILAB ITEMS!!! NO PSY!!! !!! MUST DOWNLOAD!!!” -> someone downloads said framework -> cycle of life continues.

Read full topic
